website_summaries.verdict: A decent and supportive shoe for the low price.
pros: A good pick for gym workouts, trail running and mud run events
Colors are vibrant but not blinding
Comes in navy, metallic silver, castlerock, and gray
Upper made of synthetic material and breathable mesh
Removable insole, shock-absorbing EVA midsole, non-marking rubber outsole
cons: Top shoelace eyelet has a tendency to break
These ride higher in the heel than other sneaker designs

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for your money!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes for walking. As some others have said they do ride a little higher up on the back of the heel than other shoes that I am used to. Due to some other issues I have been having, I did put an insert in my shoes and they fit perfectly inside without removing anything. They were also such a great value. Would definitely buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Supersnow

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes! I wear a size 6.5, ordered a 6.5, and it fit true to size! Although, I do recommend wearing thicker socks when wearing them. I was looking for a good looking, colorful, bright, and relatively cheap pair of running shoes, and I am happy to say these are it :) Although these shoes are designed perfectly for trail running, I have been using them indoors at the gym, and the grip is amazing. I also don't feel the shoes are stiff and are very easy to break into. They are very comfortable and have not caused any pain so far. Highly recommend! I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu A.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 10 year old daughter. She wears a ladies size 7 (for now) and has fairly wide feet for a kid. These fit her perfectly and she loves them. She says they are ultra "bouncy." The price was perfect - I don't like to spend a lot of money on shoes that are going to be outgrown in 6 months. But the quality is very good. The color is great too - not so light that they will get dirty, but also not so dark that they look like boys shoes. She plays in the gym at the after-school center quite a bit and these soles will not mark up their floors either.
customer_reviews.author: KRob

customer_reviews.title: I'm walking on concrete all day at work and the shoe is extremely comfortable. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 and I ordered a size 9 and they fit perfectly. Only complaint I have is one tongue is longer than the other, so I have to stuff it back in the sneaker. I'm walking on concrete all day at work and the shoe is extremely comfortable. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Camomof2

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Had shoes a few weeks and had to buy gel insoles because my feet hurt after working out. Then the top eyelet broke while I was tying them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect first time though
customer_reviews.text: Never brave enough to buy shoes online before - my foot is a challenge to fit. These were perfect first time though, very comfy. I'll be ordering more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: I have an old pair just like these & love them
customer_reviews.text: I have an old pair just like these & love them. However I was dissapointed when I pit on the new pair. They feel a little narrow in the toe. Other than that, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes so much, this is the second pair I have purchased. Lots of support and breathable. Removable liners mean I can easily replace them with my orthopedic inserts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for foot strength rebuilding
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are perfect for physical therapy or just being pregnant and having “extra” swelling during the hot summer. Appreciated the width even though not advertised as a wider shoe. Also, my Mom needed more support as well as a shoe that wasn’t too flexible and she loved these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed shoe at a great price!...Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is a nicely designed shoe at a great price. I purchased this pair as a Christmas gift for my wife and she was very happy when opening the box. About 4 months in to wearing them daily, so far they have held up just fine with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bri@n32

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart worst running shoes I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart worst running shoes I have ever bought. Pieces of the tread fell off the Fila on the tongue fell off. I have a feeling these are knock offs and not real FILA.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in production?
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third pair of these and after ordering this pair a year ago I just started wearing these when my old pair wore out. The first time I wore them the top eyelet broke but I still had the hole at the top to use. Now the other exact eyelet on the other shoe tore out the same way. Very disappointed as I have really loved Fila and especially this model.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Myers

customer_reviews.title: second pair, repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: second pair and I'll buy them as long as they're available
customer_reviews.author: R. A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible shoes, wore them for a week and the lace bands starting to break. Laces also frayed within two weeks of wear! I had to get a new pair to replace these sneakers within a month. Extremely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh - idk
customer_reviews.text: my heel slipped out of both shoes. The toe box seemed to fit ok though, so perhaps it's just my foot???? Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my needs. I've tried every shoe on the planet, all of the name brands and higher price ranges, but I always come back to these. Very comfortable and provides the cushion and support I need! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY STRATTON

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, fits good, got these to replace my old walking shoes. The only slight negative I've not noticed is that the insoles are not very cushiony, but rather on the stiff side.
customer_reviews.author: S.F. CityGirl (SFCG) aka Dragongirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and doesn't break the Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I use these everyday to do chores, work in the garden, you name it. They're comfortable and stand up to a daily beating.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I've had them about a year now and I'm extremely happy with the way they stand up to wear and tear. The colors are vibrant, but not overwhelming, with nice gray accents. Will definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Claire Becan

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I ordered 1/2 size bigger, which I didn't need to actually but it doesn't bother me. These shoes are comfy. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Returning.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving these shoes, they seemed comfortable and fit true to size. However, the first time I wore them for a walk they tore up the back of my feet. The back of the shoe is very high and doesn't allow natural movement. I had to return them because they were so painful to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are perfect for road workouts
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are perfect for road workouts, though I don't know that I recommend wearing them too much outside of the workout. There is not enough cushioning to make them comfortable for around-the-house wear.
customer_reviews.author: BrandyWinn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality except that within a month one of the straps that holds the shoelaces ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Brugger

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I use them to work out at the gym, mud runs, treadmill, running. They are great and offer very good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say they fit me perfectly and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these shoes that I have purchased. Needless to say they fit me perfectly and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Montague

customer_reviews.title: held up fine.
customer_reviews.text: After a while the pink zigzags on the bottom started peeling make the shoe more of tripping hazard. Otherwise, held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Day

customer_reviews.title: The loops for the laces are broken in two places ...
customer_reviews.text: The loops for the laces are broken in two places. I haven't even had these for two months. Very unhappy and it's too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Callista Clark

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. Compared to other Fila shoes I have owned these fit a little loose. I probably could have ordered a 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like these and they are a fun color
customer_reviews.text: I like these and they are a fun color. It does make my ankle socks slide of my heel though while running and my old shoes didn't.
customer_reviews.author: NW_Artist

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe or ever day comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good running shoe or ever day comfortable shoe. I bought this shoe for my teenage daughter and she wears them every single day. They are holding up well and she likes them. For the price, this was a great deal .
customer_reviews.author: Stewfam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my wife has used these outside running a few times now and loves them!
customer_reviews.author: mikko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright colors. They look exactly like the picture and they fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Candie

customer_reviews.title: Run a little wide
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoes is fine, but they are a bit wide.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love rhe colors
customer_reviews.text: Love rhe colors! The fit ran a little small so went up a whole size like I do in Nikes. They run a little stiff and not much cushion on the inside so might need gel inserts. Other than that love them!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Shoe of choice
customer_reviews.text: I always choose Fila shoes because I have a bad ankle and the way they are cut makes walking and working out much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Reader E.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great trail runner
customer_reviews.text: Great trail runner sneakers, fit was perfect. Wore them for a mud race and they worked just fine, comfortable, and they held up great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received these shoes yesterday that I bought to take on vacation pulled them out of box and they had a stain on the top of the show, thought I was getting new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: brittany l mooday

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are junk!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend these shoes to anyone. The tread is falling off the bottom already. The second day I wore them a large red piece of the track fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa salter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Needed new shoes to replace my old filas. Perfect for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice for daily walks with my dogs
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, great deal for a day to day walking shoes. I wouldn't recommend these for running.
customer_reviews.author: NEW WEST

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and provide great cushioning for my feet
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and provide great cushioning for my feet, support for my ankles by keeping my feet pointed forward, and the colors are super fun.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRuth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Not much support but still good shoe Wide in toe are which I need
customer_reviews.author: Beth DeArmitt

customer_reviews.title: They’re cheap shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ripped 3 weeks after I bought them n wore them to the gym. Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. Holds up against more expensive newer styles. Lighter than appears in picture. I've run on better shoes, but only paid $35 each for two pairs and am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gal Friday

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I can order these shoes online and know they're going to fit and be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Skyy_Girl

customer_reviews.title: I have narrow feet so it's not the product's fault ...
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet so it's not the product's fault - very comfy. Walked around Disney and Universal for 4 days and feet weren't sore at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: True to size, comfortable and inexpensive. Not to mention look good
customer_reviews.author: Francine M Ullrich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The shoes were as expected, delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes and fast shipping The shoes run big,.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Hirak

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this shoe. I did replace the inserts with ones with more arch support though.
customer_reviews.author: Donnell Squires

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are so comfty! I'm on my feet all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Echo Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes. Great support for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After surgery shoe  A+
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for post bunion surgery so I bought them a 1/2 size larger. It worked perfectly and they are comfortable on my post surgery feet. They have an enlarged foot bed insert that extends slightly on each side and fits into my arch. The heel is nice and cushy and that is good for me since I am trying not to put much pressure on the front of my foot. These shoes have worked out exactly and I intended them to.
customer_reviews.author: sandped

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: My first time wearing them, pulled the laces tight and the top loop broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Tahnya M. Hyer

customer_reviews.title: ... time I have purchased this brand and they fit great! Little or no break in time
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased this brand and they fit great! Little or no break in time. I wear them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size. I normally wear a 7.5 in pretty much all shoes/boots and these fit exactly right in a 7.5. Very lightweight and pretty comfortable too. I ordered the silver/castlerock/diva pink color because the price was really good and they were tasteful. The "diva pink" is actually neon orange. I'm pretty sure they sent the grey/coral pair instead of what I ordered but they're definitely neon orange. Very bright. Not really the color I wanted but not worth it to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish, comfy & lightweight for the price. Provides great support & moves in sync with my gait.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Pie

customer_reviews.title: Love Fila
customer_reviews.text: I love fila because I have wide feet and I can bye them with out trying them on
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna green

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes, and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for about two months. They are very comfortable for walking to and from the gym. Unfortunately I'm, not much of a real runner, but I do chase my kids around quite a bit and I haven't been uncomfortable in these shoes at all. I had a pair of shoes I paid $150 for at a specialty shoe store, and they ended up really hurting my feet. I am much happier with my AFFORDABLE and well-reviewed shoes from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa N.

customer_reviews.title: My feet are so "happy"!
customer_reviews.text: I am flat footed and have a foot that has been effected by bunion surgery which will forever be a bit more swollen than the other foot and these shoes are way comfortable for my 45 min workouts and just walking around in them after I am done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Made my knees and feet hurt terribly from just walking 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Made my knees and feet hurt terribly from only using it 2 hours. I think it's cause the arch is high and my feet are almost flat? I don't know. I returned it. Plus there very bulky and stiff sneakers. Can't imagine someone running in these. I merely walked in them and they were so painful.
customer_reviews.author: eec

customer_reviews.title: This was a reorder of this shoe for me. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder of this shoe for me. I bought the original pair at Costco and wore them for over a year. Received the second pair which fit well, but within days, the last loops that hold the shoe strings started to pop. First one, then all of them eventually broke. The shoes are still wearable, but this did not happen on the first pair. Must be a defective batch.
customer_reviews.author: Art Reid

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The inside sole inserts were loose and not connected to the shoe. The glue looked old and yellow. They are faulty. Both shoes have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit well but back and knees hurt after standing for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: ... walking again after having a broken foot and they're comfortable for the two miles a day I walk
customer_reviews.text: Use them to start walking again after having a broken foot and they're comfortable for the two miles a day I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Stern Fan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a little stiff and somewhat bulky, but quite supportive.
customer_reviews.author: zakazan

customer_reviews.title: ... a big fan of tennis shoes but these are great! I like Nike and Fila shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big fan of tennis shoes but these are great! I like Nike and Fila shoes, my feet hurt from reebox and new balance
customer_reviews.author: bgood02

customer_reviews.title: super!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the way look and better yet how they feel!
customer_reviews.author: James Dennis

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: they are very reasonable price and feel great on my feet
customer_reviews.author: Carletta Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY COMFORTABLE BUT SEEMS A BIT TOO BIG FOR A SIXE 8
customer_reviews.author: PHILLY PHAN

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and feel comfy
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes before so I just ordered the same size. Fits nice and feel comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes for the price. They didn't have the memory foam but they still are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Schmitz

product_meta.title: Fila Women's Headway 6 Running Shoe
product_meta.description:
Fila trail running shoes offer cushioning, great fit, comfort, foot protection and stability for all surfaces and terrain.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.
feature_bullets: Upper made of nylon mesh for lightweight and breathability
Outsole made of rubber for traction and durability
Lugged outsole provides stability on uneven surfaces
